item.title: My setup
item.description: Setup My coding setup consists of a dual-monitor arrangement and a high-performance PC featuring a GeForce 3080, an i7-12700KF, 64GB RAM 3200MHz, and a 2TB SSD. This configuration allows me to efficiently handle large datasets and run resource-intensive algorithms, enhancing my productivity.
